description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Go to shoes category
Click on the first product and verify user lands on PDP page
Add product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is there.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the respective login fields.
Click the login button to submit the credentials.
Verify that the landing page displays the title 'The Store'.
Click on the 'Shoes' category from the navigation menu or category list.
Click on the first product, and verify that user lands on PDP page by verifying product name.
Click on the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page.
Navigate to the cart page by clicking on the cart icon or link.
Verify that the product added is present in the cart.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm successful operation.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate, add product and verify cart

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that price is reflected correctly.
Increase quality by 1 and verify that the prices adjusts accordingly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005.
Enter the username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form.
Click the login button and wait for the page to load.
Verify that the landing page has the title 'The Store'.
Scroll down using PageDown to bring the 'Just In' section into view.
Locate the first product in the 'Just In' section and click the 'Add to Cart' button.
Navigate to the cart page (e.g., click the cart icon or go to /cart) and wait for it to load.
Verify that the correct price of the added product is displayed in the cart.
Increase the product quantity by 1 using the increment (plus) button.
Verify that the cart's total price updates accordingly based on the increased quantity.
Take a screenshot of the completed cart page to document the final state.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, add product, verify price update

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that cart is not empty
Delete product from the cart and verify user gets "Your cat is empty" message (instead of button there is SVG image represenging delete icon)

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005.
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the respective login fields.
Click the login button to submit the credentials.
Verify that the landing page displays the title 'The Store'.
Scroll down using the PageDown key if necessary to view the 'Just In' section.
Locate the first product in the 'Just In' section and click on its 'Add to Cart' button.
Click on the cart icon or navigate to the cart page to view your cart.
Verify that the cart is not empty by confirming the added product is present.
Click on the delete icon (SVG image) to remove the product from the cart.
Verify that the cart displays the message 'Your cat is empty' indicating that it is now empty.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm the test outcome.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, add product, verify cart deletion
